mapper.insert: insert into weather_index (id, area_id, area_cn, publish_time, i1, i2, i3, i4) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{areaId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{areaCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
